data: To be completed for clients suspected of having COVI19 or clients with symptoms thought to be from COVID-19
NIP for (POC) testing using the Abbott ID NOW Analyzer to test for SARS-CoV-2 virus (the cause of COVID-19 disease) during the COVID-19 pandemic
Rapid POC testing is not completed prior to or upon return from Medical Appointments, Hospital Day Transfers or Court Appearances
Rpid POC testing is not for second ‘confirming’ test if a rapid POC test result is positive
Rapid POC testing is not to be used for symptoms that develop after initial intake, or outside of the permitted scope outlined above for Rapid POC testing

For all other COVID-19 testing outside of the scope  adhere to the regular requirements and processes for lab testing as outlined in the DST for COVID-19 Testing Procedure/NIP (Clients Patient) BCMHSUS
once, NIP for POC Covid-19 testing
